dialog: What art thou implying?
For thou hast come of age in a year of great political upheaval.
I had not considered such a thing.
Had thou not?
Indeed not, but I remain exhilarated nonetheless.
Thou should be, for thou art now a part of history.
May I be of assistance?
Aye. I seek a pair of shoes to purchase.
Hast thou a specific design in mind?
Perchance sneakers or sturdy footwear.
Is there a particular brand thou wouldst prefer?
Might I inspect that pair of canvas shoes? They appear quite lovely.
Observe, how grand and magnificent the tour of the Tiananmen Gate is!
What is the significance of the Tiananmen?

It is the largest public square in the world, home to a monument to the people's hero and the Chairman Mao memorial hall to the south. To the west stands the Great Hall of the People, and to the east, two museums.
And what is that yonder?
Why, that be the Forbidden City, to the north of the Gate building.
All sights in China are most beguiling. A journey to this land is most certainly worth one's time. My thanks for thy guidance, and I shall miss thee.
I have collided with a fence post, resulting in injury. What say thou to this matter? Blast and damnation, it hurts considerably!
We must hasten thee to a wizarding hospital. I shall take thee upon the back of my broomstick.
